snippet: Britain will travel to Canada in the first round of the 2017 Davis Cup, while the United States host Switzerland, after the draw was made on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Britain will travel to Canada in the first round of the 2017 Davis Cup, while the United States host Switzerland, after the draw was made on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Britain Clash With Canada in 2017 Davis Cup
headline.main: Britain Clash With Canada in 2017 Davis Cup
